1.content:
"So, what in the world are you babbling about, Frank?!" John asked with a yawn, as he opened the door of his home to his brother. "It's just after one in the morning! This better be good!"

"Bro...you're not going to believe this, but seein' is believin'!" Frank answered, as he rushed past John straight into his "man cave" in the rear of the house.

John followed, still skeptical. "Man, if you're yankin' my chain..." he muttered. But, truth be told, he was intrigued. Frank wasn't one for practical jokes, so there must be something to be excited about. The old child-like intrigue grew in John. The same feeling he often had as a child as Frank's excitement about some new project boiled over and affected him.

"So...where are Patches and Fred?" Frank asked, referring to Rachel's cat and John's dog. "They normally sleep back here don't they."

"Patches and Fred?" John said, confused. "They're sleepin' in the laundry room tonight. Why?"

"Just follow me," Frank answered.

He led the way into the laundry room where Fred was stretched out on a small mat with the cat sleeping on a stool just alongside.

"Now, put your hand on this." Frank held out a silver device that looked like nothing that John had seen before. It had a few buttons like a remote control, but the shape was different than any remote he'd ever seen. The device was small enough to fit in your pocket, but had enough strange angles and curves to make it look almost alien.

"It's very important that you put your hand on this," Frank repeated. "If you're not touching it, you want see the change...at least that's my understanding."

"Ok...ok...I'm touching it."

"Great! I'm going to hold it and activate it. You just hold it on the bottom," Frank excitedly said. And with that he pointed the device at Fred and pushed a large red button on the device that was shaped like a lightning bolt. Then he turned the device toward Patches and pushed the button again.

John couldn't believe his eyes, but almost instantaneously he saw Fred's head, reduced in size, atop Patches' body lying on the stool. He looked down and saw his cat's head, larger and proportionate now, atop his middle sized hound dog's body.

"Good gosh, man! What the #$#%% did you just do?!" he proclaimed, half angry and half excited.

"Nothing that you should be concerned about," Frank smiled as he turned toward John. "Your pets are none the wiser. Go ahead and call Fred."

John leaned over and patted his knee..."Come here Fred, come here, boy!" The hybrid creature with the dog-head and cat-body immediately sprang to its feet jumped off the stool and came over to John and licked his hand.

Meanwhile the cat-headed animal got up and languidly headed for the litter box, a place where Fred would never go near.

"What we have here, my friend, is something incredible beyond words!" Frank said.

"You say you just found this?" John asked.

"I did," Frank said. "I left early today, very angry. You see John... I was let go today. With the economy the way it is, they had to make cut-backs. I was downright pissed, but on the way outside, there this was, on the ground, obviously dropped by mistake. Now that I see what it can do, I'm not returnin' it to those bastards. We've got to figure out what use we can make of it!"

"What do you mean 'use'?" John said.

"You don't know the half of it, John," Frank grinned. "This don't just work on animals."

With that...
1.title: An Incredible Discovery!

11.content:
“What are you babbling about?” inquires John.

“I’ll show you,” smiles Frank. “Here, put your hand on the device again so you can see this.” He points the device at a college couple walking down the street and presses the large red button with the lightning bolt on it.

The couple has switched heads! The female student, with her long flowing blonde hair, has her attractive head on the male body wearing a tight black T-shirt, accentuating her muscular upper body. She also wore a pair of jeans and dirty white sneakers.

Conversely, the male head, with his trimmed short brown hair, is on the woman’s body wearing a pink blouse with spaghetti straps that can barely contain his new 36D breasts. He wears a denim mini-skirt, white fishnet stockings, and very high 7’ black stilettos.

“Wait up, Suzy!” he complains, awkwardly walking with his hourglass figure swaying with every step he takes.

“I don’t know why you decided to dress like a whore,” sighs Suzy, stopping in her tracks to wait for Thomas to catch up.

“I dress this way for you, baby.” Thomas says bending over, showing off his huge cleavage. Suzy blushes. In doing so, John and Frank get a quick glimpse of Thomas’ black g-string panties he’s wearing.

Suzy smiles and they kiss then both continue down the street.

--

“Wow, so they have absolutely no idea that their heads are on the wrong bodies?” asks John scratching his head.

“None, whatsoever. As far as they are concerned, they’ve always been like that.” beams Frank. “You should’ve seen the chaos I caused in the parking lot at work: there were women’s heads on men’s bodies, guy’s heads on women’s bodies, all kinds of crazy swaps. The funniest was seeing Old man Dr. Peterson with his head on a woman’s body. I never knew he’d look good in a dress – especially with his bald head, beard, and glasses,” laughs Frank.

“Why the hell do you have this? Did you steal it?” accuses John with slight anger in his voice.

“Now now… I was heading back to my car and I found it. ‘Finders Keepers’, right?” replies Frank urging his brother to lower his voice. “You have to admit. This is pretty amazing, huh?”

“I’ll say. Think of the possibilities! Crippled people could have another chance to walk again, old people could be immortal, and the sick could have another chance in life “begins John

“…Or we could just have some fun,” smiles Frank.

“Oh I don’t like that gleam in your eye,” sighs John, “What are you thinking of?”

111.content:
"What are you thinking of?" asked John.
However, Frank stayed quiet, and just said "Tomorrow, the fun shall begin. You're staying in our guest bedroom."




The next morning, John woke to find Frank fully dressed, impatient, and waiting for John.

"Hurry up!" he exlaimed, obviously wanting the fun to begin.

John sighed and dressed in baggy jeans, work boots, and his favorite football team jersey, and went back to the living room.

"Follow me," Frank said, a wide grin on his face.

Frank got into his car, John following him, still confused as to where they were going.

A few minutes later, they found themselves at a park, swarming with many different types of people.

They got out of the car and found an empty park bench, and sat down. The park was full of people, young and old alike.

The two remained quiet until John finally asked. "So, what are we doing here?"
"We're gonna swap people, for our own amusement," Frank said, still grinning. "I'll give you two choices, and you pick which to swap first."

First, Frank pointed at a family next to the jungle gym; a mother, father, and son. The son was getting his mouth cleaned; he had ice cream all over his face, complaining, wanting to go back to the jungle gym to play.

The mother looked like she was in her mid 20s, youthful and quite beautiful. She was blond and had a slim figure. She was dressed in a teal spaghetti strap top, a white knee length skirt, and 3 inch high heeled sandals.

The father looked like he was in his late 20s, also young and handsome. He had dark brown hair, and a figure that looked like he worked out on occasion. He was in a black business suit; it looks like he didn't have time to change, as his son wanted to go to the park with his parents.

The son looked about 8. He had a Cars shirt on, white and blue striped shorts, and shoes that light up.

Frank grinned. "Choice one. Swapping the mother and son. And choice two is....there," he said, pointing in a different direction.
In the other direction he was pointing in.

There were two groups of people in that direction. On the grass, two high school seniors were making out; a muscular jock was lying down on the grass with his girlfriend, a preppy girl. She wore a pink hollister collared shirt, denim miniskirt, and high heeled sandals.

Then Frank pointed to a group of high school freshman; nerds. They were on the picnic table, playing Magic: The Gathering cards. Two were playing, the other 3 were watching. One of them that was playing, and currently in the lead/winning, had a black Halo 3 tshirt on, high water pants, and New Balance sneakers.

Frank grinned. "Or the girl and the nerd."

George, wearing Miss Webster's navy blue skirt suit, white ruffled blouse and 3-inch patent leather pumps was in an animated discussion with a few boys about some movie or show he'd seen. He was acting out the part of someone who used both guns and swords, probably either a pirate flick or a Star Wars episode. His abrupt movements made his breasts bounce rather captivatingly and Frank wondered if that is what was keeping the other boys spellbound.

Frank's mind wandered back to the swap between George and Miss Webster. Of all the places to randomly swap why his school? And why his classroom? It was Lilly with her head on his body who had performed the switch. What could that mean? Did she perhaps have some residual memory that drew her here? And what of Irene? She of course wouldn't be able to tell that Frank's head had been swapped with a nine year old girls. And what did the two of them do last night? Asking himself what he would probably do, he found he didn't like the answer?

Meanwhile a trio of girls had spotted Frank and came over to make fun of him now that he was separated from his own peer group. They started chanting a ridiculous rhyme that had a lot of "silly", "girly" "willy" and "Lilly" thrown in it. Frank just looked at them with quiet resignation.

"Leave her alone!" Frank and the girls were surprised to hear. "Ganging up three to one on another girl who didn't do anything. "I don't think I like you girls anymore." George said, walking over authoritively in Miss Webster's body. "Come on girls. "Let's leave Lilly alone with her boyfriend." The leader of the girls said.

"Thanks George. "I didn't know what I was going to do." Frank said, "Here, do you want my lollipop." Gladly handing it to the boy in appreciation.

"Aw, you didn't hafta Lilly. "You've always been kinda nice to me." And George sat down next to him, crossing his legs in a feminine manner and unwrapping the lollipop. "Why are you sitting here by yourself?"

Frank had to think fast. "Well... I heard Mommy and Daddy yelling at each other last night and I'm worried what will happen."

George thought for a second, playing with the lollipop in his mouth, momentarily distracting Frank. "Nah, you don't have to worry. "It's when they stop talking to each other altogether, or they start hitting each other that you have to worry." And he smiled reassuringly at Frank, his shoe on his raised leg dangling from his pantyhosed foot. Something that always aroused Frank when he saw women do it in the past. "Er, thanks George I'll try to remember that. "Gee you're pretty smart." Frank said, and watched the boys head blush somewhat, his free hand dropping to the top of his leg, unconsciously rubbing his shin, causing Frank's eyes to remain fixed there.

"Tell that to Miss Webster." George said, "I wish I could do math as quick as you. "How'd you do that?" "Well, with the multiplication table you just start small, work on one number at a time until you've got it memorized then move onto the next." Frank said, "You can do it in your spare time as a game, even during recess or lunch." "Will you show me?" George asked. "Uh, sure George. "But aren't you afraid you'll be made fun of for being my boyfriend?" "Well, not if you don't mind being made fun of for being my girlfriend." Blushing even more. "Okay, George. "I really can't see anybody else in the World I'd rather have as a boyfriend right now." And the two kids spent the rest of the lunch hour talking, without learning anything new about math.

George wasn't wearing an oversized pair of boy shorts and t-shirt, he was instead wearing what Miss Webster clearly used when she exercised, which just happened to be a pair of red leotards and black tights. It didn't look like he was wearing a sports bra either, as his breasts were rather high and conical. Apparantly Miss Webster went to some kind of dance class after work in order to stay fit. Though Frank's jaw was hanging open none of the kids, or the gym teachers, paid the least bit of attention to George. Who at the time stood in a relaxed pose with most of his weight on his right foot with his left trailing behind. His right elegantly manicured hand was resting on his hip with his left hanging behind him. He looked bored and had to stifle a yawn.

"Okay everybody, divide yourselves into two teams, we're going to be playing murder ball this afternoon." Mr White, the gym teacher said.

"Stay behind me Lilly. "I'll try and protect you." George said to Frank, who was thinking being knocked out of the game early might not be such a bad idea. But he figured he might as well support his "Boyfriend" and let him play the hero.

The balls were now placed along the line in the center of the gym and both teams had their hands against the wall waiting for the signal. Mr White raised his whistle to his lips, paused dramatically, than gave a quick blast on it and the kids were off. Almost all kids. For George took one stride and tripped on his heels. "Are you all right George?" Frank asked trying to help the grown woman's body George possessed to get up. "Yeah, but I guess I lost my chance to grab a ball though." George replied, quickly ducking a ball aimed at his head.

In the next few minutes George showed excellent skill in both dodging balls and keeping on his feet despite his heels. Unfortunately, Frank and George's side were losing more players than the opposition and eventually it was just the two of them against five other kids. And they now had all the balls. Momentarily safe he looked over George and felt a bit of a thrill seeing how fetching he looked with his legs folded up beneath him. "Thanks Lilly, I think we've got this game won now." They chit chatted for a while and John noticed that almost the almost everyone living along the street was out working on their gardens and the kids in the area where already out playing. “Great”, he said silently with a smile.

The left George and spotted the woman from yesterday who had tried to steal their remote. John had a bit of a bad unforgiving character and immediately thought about the revenge they spoke about yesterday. John fiddled with the device and identified one of the special feature buttons he had noticed before. “Put your hand on the remote”, John urged Frank in a decisive tone and then pointed the remote towards George while firing. “What did you do” questioned Frank. “You’ll see, you’ll see my friend”, mumbled John. John then redirected the remote, still with Frank’s hand touching it, towards the woman who sat, from John’s and Frank’s viewpoint, as always outside their big house in her garden chair with her cane leaning to its side.

“You know”, said John, “George has always been a nice neighbor to us and I feel pity for him since his wife passed away some years ago. I reckon that he always try to dress at his best, has a body in great shape for his age, but it does really not match his gray hair, well what is left of it.” Frank, agreed with a nod. They pressed the button and zaaaappp….

They could see George in a distance, trimming the hedge just outside his garden, but releasing the grip of the garden shear to put a strand of his long dark brown hair behind his ear, and then he continued working as nothing happened.

Across the street sat the woman and her husband had come out. They could hear her asking her husband “Please sweetie, can you bring my brown Fedora hat, you know my head does not take strong sun that well”, and her husband went for her, well George's old, hat and soon returned while she scratched her mostly bold head with some grey traces of hair.

John smilingly explained that “I thought a hair swap was a sufficient revenge for her little evil effort of her stealing our remote, as a full body swap would simply be too harsh”. Little did they know that George did now not just wear the wife’s shoulder long dark brown hair in a style suited for the modern woman making regular visits to a high end fashionable hairdresser, but also that he wore the wife’s clothes and he had her voluptuous body below his neck. George on the other hand was unaware about his new hairstyle, but as far as he could remember he was very proud of his nice hair he had since his childhood that fortunately also went very well with his new body and clothes he gained the day before. George in his dark red bikini making the final touch up on the garden hedge, said “well that will do it”, and he adjusted his bikini as he walked inside and for putting up his hair with a clip.

John, happy with what they had accomplished so early in the day, said “Com a long, let’s see what’s down the road”, to Frank and they strolled further away on the outlook for prospective targets.

John rubbed his neck as he watched Frank fiddle with the device. Frank caught sight of him doing so and chuckled. "Thinking of that hot night-gown wearing body you had yesterday little bro?"

John shuddered as he remembered his brother having previously exchanged his original male body with that of one of the lovelier neighbor lady's body. He had been livid as he teetered around on her fluffy high heel slippers while Frank laughed and watched him stew. Fortunately, after the incident with the decrepit neighbor woman trying to steal the remote Frank had relented and switched John back to his original self. "I'll readily admit it was a hot piece of ass Frank, but I have no desire to experience having my head perched upon it again!" John sighed as he once more made sure his neck was intact.

Frank just continued to laugh as he looked over at the neighbor family again. "You're going to have to get over your hang ups and just enjoy the ride little brother." Frank smiled fiendishly as he looked at the woman he had switched George's grey, balding hair style with mere moments before; completely unaware of her innocence and the fact that she had had her sexy milf-body exchanged with George's septuagenarian male one the day before as well. "Servers her right...thief..." Frank muttered as he watcher her slowly creak toward the family's minivan.

John looked over at her as well. He couldn't muster much sympathy for her either. He shuddered at the thought of his possibly being trapped forever with the night-gown clad body he had had when she had tried to steal their device the day before; completely unaware that George had actually been the one to make the attempt. "What next Frank?" John asked.

Frank watched the woman's family head out to the minivan as well. The former football playing father had dressed his buff self in a stylish polo shirt, pants, and loafer ensemble. The woman's very pretty teenage daughter was wearing a cute little sundress that showed off a lot of skin, and a pair of platform sandals. The couple's young son was in a tiny polo shirt of his own and was wearing a pair of shorts and sneakers. "I'm thinking we should play around with that thieving little bitch's family as payback as well." Frank smiled with a evil look in his eyes.

Meanwhile, across the street George was peeking out of his window from behind the drapes. He watched the brothers before glancing down at the amazingly hot red bikini clad body he now found his old man's head affixed too. While he had to admit that it was nice to have a young, pain free body for a change, he had very little desire to become a blasted woman! He had to get that device back from the brothers! He walked away from the drapes and decided to get dressed in more appropriate attire as he considered possible ways to steal the reality altering device back from them.

Later that day, John and Frank sat out in garden and relaxed with a hot cup of coffee. It was a good day. The sun was shining, the bird was singing and insects were made a buzzing sound as they flew from flower to flower. John and Frank had an excellent view from here over to the big house, somewhat diagonally across the street, where the woman lived which they had taken revenge on. They had given her the hair of old, but always well dressed, George who was John’s neighbor just on the other side of their common hedge. They were not certainly done yet, and discussed various plans.

Over at the house of the neighbor woman, the whole family was out, her husband, daughter and son. The hot teenage daughter had even got a visitor, her boyfriend, and they were now making out behind the big old tree that hid them for her mum and dad, yet in good view for John and Frank.

It was a steady flow of people coming and going on the street. There was an old lady out walking with her dog, the mum with a pram for her baby and her 8 year old daughter running around her legs as she pushed the pram slowly. A family down the road was moving in one of the houses and John noticed that they had good help of a moving company and a number of sturdy men (and from the look of them, possibly with a doubtful background). A mailman was handing out the mail in the area. He was driving a small electric mail service owned car, which he jumped in and out from at every stop with a letter box for which he had mail to. Children played and cycled on the street. Fortunately, just a few cars were coming and going on the street were the children played.

John sat with the remote, and in a desperate act, and in lack of fantasy, he suggested that they swap the teenage daughter in a summer dress, with her fairly good looking and well built boyfriend.

Frank did not even look up from the newspaper he was reading, he merely put his hand on the remote as John was pointing. First shooting at the girl, and then moving it slightly and locking the remote on her boyfriend and John press……

Bzzzzzz, was the sound the wasp made as it touched Franks hand while landing. Frank instinctively and abruptly moved it a bit, just to hinder the wasp to sit down and sting him.

…and John pressed the button of the remote completely down to the bottom.

John let out a shocked “what a….” and Frank tiredly had to look up from the newspaper. Things did not go as planned, that was clear to Frank. John and Frank now looked at the hot teenage girl immaculately dressed in a blue mailman uniform, black large leather shoes of size 10 or so, and her height was now even an inch or so higher than her boyfriend, but her body was the rather skinny mailman’s.

The mailman had stopped at the mailbox at the house where the teenage girl lived to hand them some mails, and now his stature had decreased and his body had been compensated for with shapes he never had before. The mailman now wore a cute little sundress that showed off a lot of skin, and a pair of platform sandals, and even some rings, and a gold arm watch. A necklace with a pendant dangled between his perky breasts to draw attention to how he was created, so he thought at least.

The girl’s boyfriend did not seem to bother about the change and continued making out with his girlfriend and had his hands all over her body wearing no traces of womanly shapes.

John and Frank observed when the mailman picked up a blue colored peaked mailman cap from the ground. “He must have dropped it just before I hit the button” John declared. The girl stopped making out and ran down the grassy slope and took it from the mailman in his sun dress, and after thanking him, she put it immediately back, well so she thought, on her head and walked back to her boyfriend and they continued making out. 1131112122111.content:
The day had been great so far, not just the weather, but also considering all the great swaps they had accomplished.

The brothers discussed whether the hair swap of the neighbor woman and George, or the body swap of the woman’s daughter and the mailman, or the 8 year old daughter walking with her baby carriage pushing mum and the woman’s husband was the best. They could not agree and continued contemplated and discussing while watching the hot daughter in the mailman suit, complete with a mailman cap on her head, and still making out with her boyfriend. The mailman on the other hand was already two houses down the street. They watched him handing out mails in his sundress that moved slightly in the light breeze and as he walked in his platform heels. The mum had stooped pushing her baby carriage as she berated her daughter. “You must never run away like that again”, the mum exclaimed angrily. Without moving her eyes from her daughter towering above her, and the daughter shamefully looking down at the ground, she unconsciously took down and folded her big brown designer sunglasses that had rested on her blond hair setup in a ponytail and placed them securely at the V-neck of her blouse. “But mum?”, Cindy said. “Don’t mum me now, call me Patricia until you behave like my good little daughter again”, Patricia told her daughter.

Back at the family across the street, the son of the family had helped his little father to set up and lit the BBQ for the lunch. The father now dressed in a pink little princess t-shirt, matching girl shorts and little black Mary-Janes with socks and had put his petit hands in a pair of grilling gloves and demonstrated his new 18 pc BBQ grill tool set for everyone. “Hey son, could you help me bring a chair to the grill”, the father pointed with the huge grill tong at the chair he wanted. With a bit of effort, the father then climbed up on the chair and got to work. “Ahhhh…. Damn my best little princess T-shirt” he cursed disappointingly when he got stains from the BBQ sauce all over himself. Then he continued his duties as the man of the house.

“Why not spice up the swap a bit with some unpredictability”, Frank asked. “I target one of the swapping subject, while you close your eyes, and then we change, you shoot at one while I look away”. John enthusiastically agreed.

When it then was Franks turn, he could only hope that John had made a wise choice. Frank had no idea what his brother had come up with as he aimed the device, hit the button, and in a blink of an eye was reality changed once more.

Frank looked around and immediately spotted the head of the son of the neighbor woman, his name was Will of age 16 Frank thought. And it was now resting on Patricia’s body. With a horrendously perplexed face for a second or so did he just standing there with his hands and a tight grip to the baby carriage.

Frank and John laughed at the scene the daughter at the baby carriage where making. A few seconds ago, she would have been perfectly happy, comfortable and affectionate to the body standing just beside her that was, and still was, dressed in a bright pink button up blouse, a white knee-long hugging skirt and a pair of platform heels. But now, when the body and clothing belonged to the boy who’s head was attached on top of it, she got shocked, frightened, and exploded into uncontrolled weeping since she thought it was her mother and not someone else and got scared.

From the grassy slope beside the BBQ, John and Frank saw the mother, Patricia’s, head on the former body of a 16 year old boy. “This was a serious downgrade”, chuckled Frank. Patricia was now a proud owner of a pair of black jeans with a three rows stud spike belt hanging loosely around her new hips, and a severely washed out T-shirt with an AC/DC print, and some black sneakers.

Suddenly Patricia burst out and screamed “Baby stealer, stop, stop him” and John and Frank saw her speedily with long steps running down the grassy slope towards the baby carriage. The boy looked confused around in all directions and wondered what was going on.

As the anxious mum approached the baby carriage, she realized that it is just a little boy standing at the baby carriage and she blushed deeply and relaxed. As a recent and proud parent to an adopted baby and with a lot of emotional investments (since she could not have a baby herself with her husband) she took extra care in not losing her baby for anything in the world. “Not for anything” she repeated.

“Now, mommy has a bit of shopping at the grocery store to do before we go home” Patricia explained to Cindy, whereas Will remained perplexed at the same spot. The brothers could see Patricia checking that she brought with her credit cards that she was now picking out from her teenage boy wallet that she had fished up from her back pocket. “Look how the wallet is secured with a silvery chain to her trousers. No one is going to rob her now”, laughed Frank. “Ohhh”, Patricia said as she noticed a purse resting underneath the baby carriage. “This must be yours”, she told Will who still stood there dressed in her pink blouse and white skirt. “What, how did it get there?”, he asked surprised. He eagerly took back his white leather purse and slung the leather strap over his narrow shoulder. He let the purse rest between his arm and his slim waist which was as designed for carrying his shoulder purse.

Up at the BBQ, the first sausages were done and the father shouted “Son, daughter, lunch is ready. Come on. Time to eat”, and he then jumped down from the chair and headed over to the lunch table. The wife rose from her chair with help of her two hands on the armrest. She grabbed her cane and walked over to the lunch table. The daughter tucked in her shirt in her mailman trousers and adjusted her mailman suit after all the hugging and kissing with her boyfriend before sitting down. Frank and John watched the mum taking of her hat, scratching her head while moving some of the gray strands of hair over a balding spot. She obviously told her daughter some manner at the lunch table, who then took of her postman cap, and the mum looked very pleased.

“Look at the boy” says John amused. They watched the boy in his little pink blouse and white skirt walking around the grassy slope, as he now took short strides in his restricting skirt and walked up the driveway instead. “Damn, that’s a hot waist he got” stated John. “And those knockers looks huge on him”, Frank proclaimed. John and Frank stared at the boy who grabbed his large designer sunglasses resting between his breasts, unfolded them skillfully with a single hand movement and put it up on top of his head and held in position by his dirt blond hair and ready to use at any time.

John and Frank moved closer, so they could hear part of the conversation at the lunch table. “Honey, don’t forget your medical checkup tomorrow” reminded the father his wife. “Arthritis is nothing to play with”, he stated as a matter of fact as he stood up on his chair to reach the salad. The mother nodded in agreement, and added “And we can also check whether the new growth hormone the doctor prescribed you has arrived at the pharmacy” and dad nodded.

The rest of the lunch was event less, yet at the end they saw the boy in his new body moving away over to a secluded spot in the shadow where he started rummaging around in a large bag. They saw the boy sit down in the chair with some sort of device in his hand as he unbuttoned his pink blouse. They could hear the wife in the family shouting to her son working with the pump, “We can buy you some more nursing pads at the Pharmacy tomorrow also”. “Don’t worry mum, I’m fully stocked already”, the boy responded, “but I need you drop this at the infant center” and he held up and waved with a small bottle. The father stated as a matter of fact and in a proud tone to his wife and the other at the lunch table “That is our son”, and continued “Such a responsible citizen at that age and he is already helping the less fortunate”. The wife in the family tilted her head, smiled and looked at her son with pride and satisfaction.

As the son finished up, fastened his nursing bra and buttoned up his blouse, John and Frank agreed that this was possibly one of the oddest swaps ever and they wondered if they could ever top it.

Down at the street, the brothers watched amazed how her daughter jumps on a buggy board in tow of the baby carriage, and the mother starts pushing the baby carriage and her heavy built 7 feet tall daughter on the buggy board. Almost defying gravity, the poor and now sweaty mother finally succeeds with all her will and muscle power to get everything rolling. “Hope she can stop it if it goes downhill too”, Frank chuckle as they poor Patricia continues her desperate struggle slightly uphill.

John with an aching stomach from all the laughter says that “I think we should ….”

Frank was perhaps the more science oriented one of the two brothers, and he really wanted to research the capabilities of the device.

The last two minutes or so, John had heard some “humm, yes, hummm … and yes” alternating words coming from Frank as he read the newspaper. “Hey John, I head in for a minute or two”, Frank informed John as he put down the paper he just finished and put the device in his pocket.

As Frank came back out, John was watching a gang of the local boys in their very late teens playing soccer with each other on the street for fun.

“So what are you up to”, inquired John. “Well, this one I have in mind is very special and I need to push down two buttons exactly at the same time” informed Frank with a serious tone in his voice. John, trusting his brother, still wanted to give a good and helpful advice and pointed out some potential swapping candidates. “Perhaps those two”, John waved his arm in the direction of the old woman coming back from her walk with her dog on leash, and one on the parents living up the street who had come out to tell her sons Vincent and Jeffrey that lunch will get ready a bit earlier than agreed, but now watched them playing a bit.

“Well, I had more this in mind” says Frank and does the final preparation by putting two of his fingers on two different remote buttons, and then swings his arm with the remote around his back and shoots right into the group of teenage boys playing a kind of soccer out on the street.

With an instantaneous Zzaaap sound and blending flash, John was blown away with what he saw. Out there on the street, one of the boys who had been wearing a pair of blue gym shorts, a blue t-shirt and trainers now moved around in high slip on heels, a pair of black skin tight Capri length pants for some long shapely legs, a very low cut leopard patterned top exposing the cleavage of and huge set of knockers, a large black vinyl belt around the narrow waist, and to top it up, a remarkable huge red bouffant styled hair. Frank and John laughed so much that they could almost not breathe. The most hilarious was the way the boy was running and chased the tennis ball. Instead of speedy steps as a normal teenage boy, his body moved with many but mincing steps. In fact it was more his manicured hands and rounder buttock that moved than his legs and straight arms along his side when he tried to run.

“Wait, I know this body”, John exclaimed in surprise. “Can it be?”, “Is it all possible?” John did not believe his eyes what he just had witnessed.

“Yes, it is”. Frank expressed proudly, and explained that “With the right combination of buttons, this is indeed possible”. Frank, with a huge grin on his lips, said “Let me present you, Peggy Bundy plays soccer”, hahahha, Frank laughed in a roaring manner falling down on the ground with his hands on his stomach.

“No way, no way” said john, entirely blown away as he agape followed the buxom big haired red head boy chasing the ball. Suddenly one his breasts jumps out from his leopard top, and he expertly get it back in place again as it happens every day. Frank who now rose up and tried to regain his seriousness about the experiment explained that is sort of a reverse head swap, which requires an intricate sequence of buttons to be pressed, a trick for preprogramming the remote and of course an old rerun on TV. “To spice things up, in this case, I thought the hair was essential”, Frank added.

“Hey kiddo” screams John to the lucky boy. “No no, not you, you there” instruct John and points his finger. The boy with the hot Peggy Bundy body and huge red hair points at himself and John nods. “Come over here”, the boy takes a few steps to pavement, bends down and picks up his jacket that among the other ones the boys have put there while playing. John almost faint now when he sees that the boy’s jacket he puts on turns out to be a black woman’s coat with a leopard pattern fur trim. “If I’m not entirely mistaken, isn’t that one of those coats Peggy Bundy always wore?”, John asks and turn around to Frank who is nowhere to see. John, to eager to check how real this is than finding out where Frank went, turns around to the boy coming in his direction with his hand and buttock movements and tip toeing stride. John thinks it like an extreme caricature of feminine walking, yet exactly the way he has seen Peggy move on TV.

“That is a fantastic hair you got there” says John to the boy and pointing to the boy’s big red hair. “Is it your own? Is it real?”. “Of course it is my own, you moron” says the boy seriously offended and illustrates his point by trying to lift his red mane from his scalp which it is obviously grown from. John can even see single hairs pulling the skin of the scalp and he also notes a plastic looking bracelet around his wrist. “It’s fine. Sorry!”, John excuse himself and is absolutely flabbergasted that the remote is capable of doing such an utterly outlandish things like trading bodies with a female TV-character. “I could never have dreamed up this in his wildest imagination” John tells himself and shakes his head.

The boy turns around on his high slip on heels and takes off his black coat with the leopard fur trim details and shouts to his friends “kick the ball here, I’m free”. John watches him start running with his ridiculously small steps again and to his friend’s great disappointment missing the ball with at least 10 yards. “Sheesh, you always miss, Vincent”, John hears the boy’s friends in his team complaining and shaking their heads in disbelief to express how bad Vincent plays.

Frank gets back and joins John at his side. “Where were you?” asks John, “You should have seen. His hair is real, not just a wig” John said with exaltation and astounded as they watched the other team without the Peggy enhanced teenage boy getting an upper hand.

John seeing this coming points the device out among the boys again, and then one of the boys in a gray t-shirt, baggy shorts and white sneakers for the other team suddenly slows down as he now wears a skanky blue double u-neck mini dress, matching blue stilettos and sports a beach blond shoulder long hair cascading down on his back. “Is that?”, says John in utter amazement again. “Yep, he is now a proud owner of a Kelly body season 10 and her outfits” says Frank neutrally. Amazed by the swap, but not the wardrobe, “Yeesh, that is nothing” states Jon. “The other one got the better deal of the wardrobe“, continues John as he remembers many of the episodes with Peggy in revealing black, red, flowery and leopard patterned tops, even with some long flimsy nightgowns.

“But, look over there Frank. The boy with the Kelly body can still run really well even with his stiletto heels”, objects John as the boy scores a goal. “Well”, Frank says calmly “his goal is the other one on that side”, john points and with some pride continues “I think the odds have even out now”. “Damn you, Jeffrey” yells the boy’s team mates. “You know, you are a real bimbo”, shouts one. “Airhead”, grumbles another one.

“Brother”, Frank adds after a few seconds of silence. “If you think this is hilarious, you should watch one of the reruns of Married with children now”, and Frank smiles with a giant pleased grin.

1211211111111111212222111211211221112211.content:
"Well, as interesting as this is, I'd better get them back to normal." Gil thought to himself as he hit the reset button. In an instant, the tell-tale bright flash faded away revealing Rachel and Irene's bodies now had their original, prettty heads once more. Both women's eyes fluttered as they regained their wits.

With more than a little confusion Rachel and Irene looked around the room. "What on Earth are we doing in here?" Rachel asked, a half hearted grin on her face.

Irene looked around. "Yes...that was odd. Weren't we just in the kitchen talking about those dress alterations? Gil, when did we come in here?"

Gil smiled as he put the device in his back pocket. 'Oh, uh, well, you two wandered in here just a little bit ago. You were so engrossed in your conversation you must have not noticed where you were going or what you were doing?" He hoped that they would buy his clumsy cover story.

The two women smiled at each other. "Well, we do tend to rattle on, don't we Rach?" Irene laughed as she leaned over and placed a friendly hand on Rachel's knee.

"We do carry-on." Rachel answered with a wink.

As the two women walked back out of the room John and Frank rushed in, a little out of breath and with panicked expressions on their faces. "Gil! Did you see anything happen? We were in here one second and the next we were in the kitchen! Did we do anything with the "you-know-what"?"

Frank looked horrified as well. "Yeah...we're...we're not "messed-up" and don't know it are we? That damn thing has really screwed us up over the past couple of days...for all we know..."

Gil fumbled a bit before finally coming up with something to say. "Yeah...uh...I don't know guys. Everything is normal if that's what you mean. John said something about resetting things and in the next instant you two disappeared in a flash of light."

John slumped his shoulders with a bit of relief. "Well...at least we hit the reset...so we know things are back to normal."

Frank only looked slightly more at ease. "Yeah...yeah. I guess so..."

"Oh my God!!! Where's the gadget!?!?! In all of the confusion I lost track of it!" John shouted as he realized he had no idea where the device had gotten off to.

Gil pondered his options for a little bit before...
1211211111111111212222111211211221112211.title: ...hit the Reset button.

"What? Oh...shit, where the hell is it?" Gil said suddenly, looking around for the device, which he had slipped into his pocket seconds earlier. "I had it before the flash of light!" he stated.

"Oh fuck no!" Frank blurted out, as he and John also started looking for the thing.

"We have to find it, it has to be here!" John then said frantically, as he started practically turning his den upside down looking for the device.

Neither of them suspected for a second that their good friend had pocketed the device.

Gil, feeling bad for lying to his friends, nonetheless kept acting as though he had no idea where the device had ended up. He was completely amazed by its power and he wanted to test it further...by himself. Instead of bolting though, Gil stayed and pretended to help in the search, eventually making a suggestion. "Maybe Rachel or Irene ended up with it, maybe we should go check" Gil said, clicking his fingers.

"Good idea Gil!" John replied, as he slapped his brother Frank on the shoulder and started heading out of the room and towards the kitchen. Gil followed, but then...as though he had planned it to...his cell phone started ringing. Gil answered it, as John and Frank paused and turned to face him.

"O...okay honey, I'm on my way" Gil said, before hanging up the phone.

"Sorry guys, that was the wife, she's not feeling well, I gotta go" Gil informed them, frowning as he did so.

"Don't worry buddy, go and look after her" John said.

Gil smiled and nodded gratefully. "Thanks, you let me know if you find that device okay" he said, as he took a deep breath and looked at John and his older brother.

"Will do, and give our love to the missus!" Frank responded, before he and John headed to the kitchen, where their wives were still sat chattering away.

"Bye guys" Gil said, before they both disappeared from view.

A slightly devious smile then appeared on Gil's face as he left the Parker household, his hands slipped into his pocket and caressed the switching device as he walked across the street to his house. His wife, Cynthia, age 41, was infact in good health, and had just phoned Gil up to let him know she was back home from work.

"Not bad buddy, not bad, Rachel its nice to see you here" Gil replied, as he shook John's hand and then gave Rachel a peck on the cheek. "Frank...good to have you here" he then said, greeting John's older brother, who was holding his wife Irene's hand. After planting a kiss on Irene's cheek also, Gil's wife entered the living room.

"Cynthia, so great to see you" Rachel said, as she and Irene walked over to her.

"Hiay Rach, Irene, how are you?" Cynthia responded, returning the greeting. She then looked at the two women's clothes and smiled. "Nice choice of outfits girls" Cynthia smiled.

Rachel was now wearing a black, shoulder-strap dress and a pair of knee-high, chunky-heeled boots, a very conservative choice of clothing. Rachel also had her long hair in a ponytail.
Irene, having gone home to change, was now sporting a fetching, low-cut white t-shirt, a navy blue skirt and a pair of high heel sandals, she also wore her hair down.
Meanwhile, Gil admired his own wife's choice of attire for the evening, a cleavage showing, red top, the same black skirt she had worn for work, and a pair of black patent pumps with 3-inch stiletto heels. Her blonde hair was up in an elegant bun, with several strands hung down, framing her lovely face.

All three boys, strangely enough had chosen to wear their best jeans, and casual, button-down shirts of varying colors, after all...it was only a barbeque.

"Hope you guys are hungry" Gil smiled, as he invited everyone through to the kitchen, then out into the back yard, where the barbeque was already lit.

"Did you find the device?" Gil whispered to John, who just shook his head, "No, god knows where it is" John replied, as he watched his wife chatting away to Irene and Cynthia.

"I'm sure it'll turn up" Gil said to him, as he put his hands on his shoulder.

Gil had no intention of keeping the device, after all it didn't belong to him, but he wanted to have some fun with it first, and his wife and friends had no idea. "There's beers in the fridge Frank" Gil said to John's brother, as he started cooking the burgers.

"Now you're talking! Thanks Gil" Frank said, licking his lips, "I'm parched!"

Some time later, everyone sat down at the outside table and started eating their meals, meanwhile...the device sat in Gil's pocket...waiting to be used.

Early the next morning, which was a Saturday, Frank knocked on John's door. A sleepy Rachel, wearing a robe over her nightgown, opened the door, cup of coffee in hand.

"Well Frank, what in the world are you doing here so early," she smiled. She and Frank had always gotten along well as brother and sister-in-law.

"John and I were working on a project," he answered happily as he walked into the house. "Good morning, by the way, Rachel. I'll have mine with cream and sugar." He was always happy to see Rachel. In fact, he thought she was probably more attractive than his own wife, Irene, who, while younger with a pretty face, did not have the shapely, plump figure that Frank admired in Rachel. He knew that apart from the occasional sisterly hug, though, that it was look but no touch when it came to Rachel.

"Already workin' on it," Rachel walked back to the kitchen to prepare Frank some coffee. She always enjoyed having Frank over because John liked having him over. The idea of the brothers working on a project early on Saturday morning was a bit unusual, but it wasn't unusual for them to collaborate on everything from home movies to building projects.

"Frank," John said, as Frank entered John's basement workroom with the coffee that Rachel had generously supplied. "I meant to ask you last night, what became of the guys you swapped? Did you swap them back like you did the animals?"

"Actually, no I didn't," Frank answered. "I was just too freaked out. I guess they're at home now, and feel that everything is normal."

"Too weird," John said. "If they're both married, are they having sex with each others body with each others wife?"

"I guess," Frank laughed. "Well... once I figure this thing out I'm sure I can come up with something better for that bastard Evans. He may be in a better situation now, and I definitely owe that turd for firing me."

John looked at Frank and saw his hard, bitter look. He knew that Frank could be vindictive and unforgiving, and he had often tried to help Frank get past those emotions as they had always gotten him into trouble.

"So...who are we going to test this on?" Frank asked.

"My idea," John said. "Was to test it on our next door neighbors, and then change them back."

John's neighbors were a mother and her grown daughter, and Frank said, "Sure, that'll be a good test."

The brothers opened the garage door about halfway. John explained that the next door duo went walking every Saturday morning at about this time. Just as he finished telling Frank the plan, the neighbor's door opened.

"Here, let me try it this time," John said.

"Okay, okay, I'm not going to touch it though, and then we'll know if reality is affected for those who don't touch the device if I don't see the change."

John took the device from Frank, and as he was gripping it in his hand he accidentally depressed the red lightning bolt button. "Uh, Frank... I think I just pushed the button, and I'm not sure where this was pointed."

"Oh, great...already having problems with the test. I guess just point it away from anyone and push it again...maybe that will reset it."

"John," Frank said quietly so Rachel couldn't hear as she got the paper. "So...did that reset it? I guess we'll find out after Rachel gets back inside and we try it out on the ladies." He gestured with his feminine hand toward the mother and daughter who were already walking briskly down the street away from them.

John was so shocked seeing his brother's close-cropped head on his wife's body, that he was speechless.

"Here, John, since you're all thumbs with this thing let me give it a try," he reached out to take the gadget. John, still amazed and tongue tied, reached out absentmindedly with the device. As Frank went to take it, John released it too early, and it hit the concrete hard, and a spark flew.

"Oh man," Frank said. "This thing may be broken now! What's wrong with you?!"

By this time, Rachel had disappeared back into the house, taking long steps, but with a feminine gait, in Frank's body.

info.brief_description: Another take on the headswapping theme, w/an older main character & written in 3rd person.
info.description:
John Parker is a 43-year-old married man. His wife, Rachel, is a 40-year-old, voluptuous, attractive woman. John and Rachel have a comfortable marriage, although the sex has been lackluster for the last several years...a fact that does not make John happy.

John's older brother, Frank, is 47-years-old. John has looked up to Frank since the two were boys. Frank lives nearby in the same city, and they often get together and have remained close. Frank is married to Irene, his second wife, who is an attractive 37-year-old.

One night, very late, Frank instant messages John to tell him about a remarkable device that he has found. Frank works as an accountant in a research lab, specializing in some sort of top secret research. On the way to his car, Frank finds a strange looking device on the ground.

After fiddling with some of the buttons on the device, Frank discovers that it has some incredible capabilities, most notably the ability to cause the heads of two people to swap. Most incredibly, Frank realizes that the people affected accept the exchange as if reality had always been that way.

John, who is very skeptical of Frank's story, immediately asks Frank to come over. Since Rachel and Irene are not night owls, they are both asleep, and John and Frank often get together late at night.
